name: Queen Fighters 2000
overview: Nü Wang Ge Dou 2000 (loosely translatable as Queen Fighters 2000) would be Vast Fame's first fully own-brand fighting game, and they really came out strong with this one. As you might have surmised by now, it was their take on an all-female fighting game, no doubt taking inspiration from SNK Gals Fighters for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. The game itself uses Takara's fighting engine for their The King of Fighters games. The game has difficulty settings, a sound test, single player team and one-on-one matches and multiplayer. There are 16 fighters to choose from, although the ending for each is the same.
